name: Home projects
tagline: Some mixed stuff that I do at home
body:
#My projects 
## Random name picker
This algorithm receives a list of names and it picks two random names. But the idea is that all the names will be selected and that means that the names list is being updated on each pick and the selected names are removed from the list. When the 'updated' list is empty it will load the names list from the given file and go again.

#Your ideas
If you have some ideas you want to share with me, go ahead and reach me by [email](mailto:cijalm@gmail.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
